title: Packing List
content:
Find out what to bring! This page contains the packing list for Trek.

Please arrive in one set of trek clothing. You will use the second set on Friday. DO NOT BRING ANYTHING THAT IS NOT ON THE LIST (including food, flashlights, electronics or anything else not on the list, items not on this list will be cleverly confiscated :))

Select this link for the packing list sheet: Packing List
